markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">[Armor of Bones](/Spells.aspx?ID=745)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Cursebound" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=320" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Oracle" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=319" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 230 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Mystery**
[Bones](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone. You gain resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage.

---
**Heightened (+1)** Increase the resistance by 1.
name: Armor of Bones

text: Armor of Bones Source Advanced Player's Guide pg. 230 2.0 Mystery Bones Cast Single Action somatic Duration 1 minute --- You ossify your physical form, mimicking the durability of bone. You gain resistance 3 to cold, electricity, fire, piercing, and slashing damage. --- Heightened (+1) Increase the resistance by 1.
